LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Misc.LLMsTXTGenerator.IsNoRegisted
LocaleResource.Value: Unregistered version, plugin has a 15-day trial period.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Misc.LLMsTXTGenerator.IsExpired
LocaleResource.Value: Your license has expired, you should renew the license with a 50% discount.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Misc.LLMsTXTGenerator.Settings.showDebugInfo.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Write debugging information to a file in the ~/App_Data/ folder.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Misc.LLMsTXTGenerator.Settings.IncludeBlogPosts.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Include blog posts in the llms.txt file.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Misc.LLMsTXTGenerator.Settings.IncludeCategories.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Include categories in the llms.txt file.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Misc.LLMsTXTGenerator.Settings.IncludeManufacturers.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Include manufacturers in the llms.txt file.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Misc.LLMsTXTGenerator.Settings.IncludeNews.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Include news items in the llms.txt file.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Misc.LLMsTXTGenerator.Settings.IncludeProducts.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Include products in the llms.txt file.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Misc.LLMsTXTGenerator.Settings.IncludeProductTags.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Include product tags in the llms.txt file.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Misc.LLMsTXTGenerator.Settings.IncludeTopics.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Include topics (pages) in the llms.txt file.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Misc.LLMsTXTGenerator.Settings.StoreDescription.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: A brief description of your store that will appear in the llms.txt file header. If empty, the store name will be used.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Misc.LLMsTXTGenerator.Settings.CustomSection.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Custom content (in Markdown format) that will be appended to the end of each llms.txt file. You can add any additional information, links, or sections you want to include.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Misc.LLMsTXTGenerator.Settings.IncludeProductShortDescription.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Include the short description after each product link in the llms.txt file.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Misc.LLMsTXTGenerator.Settings.IncludeProductPrice.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Include the price after each product link in the llms.txt file.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Misc.LLMsTXTGenerator.Settings.MaxItemsPerFile.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Maximum number of items per llms.txt file before pagination. Default is 10000.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Misc.LLMsTXTGenerator.RegenerateLLMsFiles.Success
LocaleResource.Value: LLMs.txt files have been successfully regenerated.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Misc.LLMsTXTGenerator.DeleteLLMsFiles.Success
LocaleResource.Value: All LLMs.txt files have been successfully deleted.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Misc.LLMsTXTGenerator.GeneratedFiles.Description
LocaleResource.Value: LLMs.txt files are generated every 24 hours via scheduled task. You can regenerate them manually using the button below.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Misc.LLMsTXTGenerator.GeneratedFiles.NoFiles
LocaleResource.Value: No files have been generated yet. Click 'Regenerate LLMs.txt Files' to create them.
